options.content: This is a generated dashboard. Any changes made here will be lost on the next generation.

targets.expr: sum(rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) by (service) / sum(rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) by (service)

sum(rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) by (protocol) / sum(rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) by (protocol)

sum(rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) by (method) / sum(rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) by (method)

sum(rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) by (code) / sum(rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) by (code)

panels.title: Service Metrics (errors) (by code, protocol, method, service)

targets.expr: sum(increase(traefik_service_requests_total{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service", code=~"(4|5).."}[$__interval])) by (code, protocol, method, service) > 0

panels.title: Request Count by code, protocol, method, service

targets.expr: sum(increase(traefik_service_requests_bytes_total{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service", code=~"(4|5).."}[$__interval])) by (code, protocol, method, service) > 0

panels.title: Request Bytes by code, protocol, method, service

targets.expr: sum(increase(traefik_service_responses_bytes_total{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service", code=~"(4|5).."}[$__interval])) by (code, protocol, method, service) > 0

panels.title: Response Bytes by code, protocol, method, service

targets.expr: sum(rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service", code=~"(4|5).."}[$__rate_interval])) by (code, protocol, method, service) / sum(rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service", code=~"(4|5).."}[$__rate_interval])) by (code, protocol, method, service) > 0

panels.title: Avg request duration by code, protocol, method, service
